headline: How Rate Shifts And Valuation Jitters Are Rewriting the Story for D.R. Horton
summary: D.R. Horton’s fair value estimate has nudged higher to around $165.67 per share, as analysts lean slightly more positive on the company’s ability to navigate a shifting rate environment. With the discount rate and revenue growth assumptions essentially unchanged, the adjustment reflects a modestly stronger conviction in the durability of the housing cycle rather than a wholesale rethink of the outlook. Read on to see what is driving this evolving narrative and how you can stay on top of...
